page.title: 13INDUSTRY AND COMMERCE
page.content: For the Doomsday project,our school chose{BRUNSWICK VILLAGE}and its surrounding area.Brunswick Village is situated about six miles north of {Newcastle city centre.}the area our group covered was about eight square miles.The subject allocated was Industry and Commerce.For our study we looked at Brunswick Industrial estate,Brunswick village,Wideopen and other surrounding industries and shops. Our group from{Blakelaw School sixth form looked at the various aspects of{Industry and Commerce} around the area. We collected our information on survey sheets designed on the computer and by asking the public in the area about Industry and Commerce. Observation also played an important part of the survey.
